trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_SEQ_00<tab>Chambui is in need of meat.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_00<tab>Slay steppe dzos and obtain their meat.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Chambui.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chunks of steppe dzo meat to Chambui's husband.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_03<tab>Report to Chambui.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_000<tab>Fancy doing some hunting for me?
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_001<tab>I have been so busy trading today that I have had no time to go hunting. Which is an issue as I am nearly out of buuz ingredients.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_002<tab>I would like you to slay four steppe dzos for me and bring back their meat. You should be able to find some just outside of Reunion.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_004<tab>We are far too busy today. I am struggling to keep up.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_010<tab>Do you have my meat?

TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_011<tab>We Dazkar are somewhat different to the other tribes in that all our hunting is done by our women. My little girls are already proving to be quite skilled with a bow and arrow.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_012<tab>I am sorry to take even more of your time, but could you deliver the dzo meat to my husband? You will find him just behind that nearby tent.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_020<tab>Why, hello! Can I help you with something?
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_021<tab>Ah, you have been hunting for my wife have you? You have my thanks.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_022<tab>I must say it is quite nice to have the chance to speak with someone that does not belong to my tribe!

TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_023<tab>I would love to talk more, but it is really time I got back to cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.

TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_024<tab>I would love to talk more, but I really need to focus on cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_020<tab>You may not be aware of this, but those from outside our tribe seldom have the chance to speak with Dazkar men.

TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_021<tab>Usually we keep our men at home, but my husband's buuz are so much better than anything I could make. I felt I would be depriving my customers if I did not give them the opportunity to sample his cooking.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_022<tab>Regardless, it is time I got back to work. Thank you for all you have done.
